title: Change Creation Output
description: Output from the change creation process, including paths to created files and index update status.

spec_path.description: Path to the created SPEC.md file

plan_path.description: Path to the created PLAN.md file (not present in spec-only mode)

index_updated.description: Whether changes/INDEX.md was updated with the new change entry

child_specs.description: Paths to child change SPEC.md files (for epic type changes)

child_plans.description: Paths to child change PLAN.md files (for epic type changes)
